autorig_script.buildscript:
# query the root control attribute and constrain the model_GRP root = self.get('root') cmds.parentConstraint(root, 'model_GRP', mo=True)
# TODO: connect by output from model_importer
# TODO: add visibility switches
# TODO: change rotation order to yxz or yzx
autorig_script.name: autorig_script
autorig_script.prescript:
# parent model group cmds.parent('model_GRP', '*_GEO_GRP')
# create control offsetA = cmds.circle(n='offsetB_CTL', ch=False) offsetB = cmds.circle(n='offsetA_CTL', ch=False) globalctl = cmds.circle(n='global_CTL', ch=False)
# parent controls cmds.parent(offsetA, offsetB) cmds.parent(offsetB, globalctl)
# place control cmds.setAttr(globalctl[0] + ".rx", 90) cmds.xform(globalctl[0], s=(5,5,5)) cmds.xform(offsetA[0], s=(0.95,0.95,0.95)) cmds.xform(offsetB[0], s=(0.80,0.80,0.80))
cmds.makeIdentity(globalctl[0], a=True)
# parent control to module group modgrp = self.getModGroup() cmds.parent(globalctl, modgrp)
# add a attribute for the control at the root self.add('root', offsetA[0])
